sources.text: Bajan (A Capella Version) - Originally Performed By Pescado Rabioso

mdx:
<TextFormatter
	insertions={[
		{
			text: "{INTRO}",
			replacement: (
				<Tablature
					positions={[
						{ guitarString: 6, guitarFret: 3 },
						{ guitarString: 6 },
						{ space: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 1 },
						{ guitarString: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 3, guitarFret: 1 },
						{ guitarString: 2, guitarFret: 2 },
						{ space: 1 },
						{ guitarString: 1 },
						{ space: 2 },
						{ guitarString: 6, guitarFret: 3 },
						{ guitarString: 6 },
					]}
					notes="Pulsar la cuerda 3 en el traste 1 y la cuerda 4 en el traste 2. Se repite 4 veces"
				/>
			),
		},
	]}
>
	{DATA.song.parsedLyrics}
</TextFormatter>
